Class InternshipFormatter

java.lang.Object
utils.formatter.InternshipFormatter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Formatter
public class InternshipFormatter extends Object implements Formatter
Default implementation for internship formatting. Provides flexible formatting options for displaying internship details. Can be extended for different formatting styles.

      Convert internal internship status to user-facing status display using reflection
      Parameters:

    • displayPaginatedTable

      public static boolean displayPaginatedTable(List<?> internships, String header, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, FilterSettings filterSettings, Consumer<Integer> onAction, String actionPrompt, Scanner sc, String border, int width)
      Display paginated table of internships without status column.
      Parameters:
      internships - list of internships to display
      header - table header text
      emptyMsg - message to show when no results
      detailGetter - function to get detail string from internship ID
      filterSettings - filter settings for the table
      onAction - action to perform on selected item
      actionPrompt - prompt text for action
      sc - scanner for user input
      border - border string for display
      width - display width
      Returns:
      true if user wants to return to previous menu

    • displayPaginatedTable

      public static boolean displayPaginatedTable(List<?> internships, String header, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, FilterSettings filterSettings, Consumer<Integer> onAction, String actionPrompt, boolean showStatus, Scanner sc, String border, int width)
      Display paginated table of internships with optional status column.
      Parameters:
      internships - list of internships to display
      header - table header text
      emptyMsg - message to show when no results
      detailGetter - function to get detail string from internship ID
      filterSettings - filter settings for the table
      onAction - action to perform on selected item
      actionPrompt - prompt text for action
      showStatus - whether to show status and visibility columns
      sc - scanner for user input
      border - border string for display
      width - display width
      Returns:
      true if user wants to return to previous menu

    • displayPaginatedTable

      public static boolean displayPaginatedTable(List<?> internships, String header, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, FilterSettings filterSettings, Consumer<Integer> onAction, String actionPrompt, Map<String, Consumer<Integer>> actions, Map<String,String> actionPrompts, boolean showStatus, Scanner sc, String border, int width)
      Display paginated table of internships with multiple actions and optional status column (full version).
      Parameters:
      internships - list of internships to display
      header - table header text
      emptyMsg - message to show when no results
      detailGetter - function to get detail string from internship ID
      filterSettings - filter settings for the table
      onAction - primary action to perform on selected item
      actionPrompt - prompt text for primary action
      actions - map of action keys to action consumers
      actionPrompts - map of action keys to prompt strings
      showStatus - whether to show status and visibility columns
      sc - scanner for user input
      border - border string for display
      width - display width
      Returns:
      true if user wants to return to previous menu
